resources.string: You can only set one ExpandableFab per orientation in an ExpandableFabLayout (you set 2 or more for the %s orientation).
Overlays, ExpandableFabs and FabOptions must be children of an [ExpandableFabLayout] in order to function properly. Please see the documentation for how to correctly use the ExpandableFab widget.

One or more optional attributes for an ExpandableFab were set, but didn't meet the criteria below: 

 Optional Attribute || Criteria 
 overlayOpeningAnimationDurationMs || must be a positive long number 
 overlayClosingAnimationDurationMs || must be a positive long number 
 expandableFabOpeningAnimationDurationMs || must be a positive long number 
 expandableFabClosingAnimationDurationMs || must be a positive long number 
 fabOptionOpeningAnimationDurationMs || must be a positive long number 
 fabOptionClosingAnimationDurationMs || must be a positive long number 
 labelVisibleToHiddenAnimationDurationMs || must be a positive long number 
 labelHiddenToVisibleAnimationDurationMs || must be a positive long number

One or more optional attributes for an Overlay were set, but didn't meet the criteria below: 

 Optional Attribute || Criteria 
 orientation || must be a value of enum class Orientation 
 overlayColor || must be an integer color or color state list 
 overlayAlpha || must be a positive floating point number 
 openingAnimationDurationMs || must be a positive long number 
 closingAnimationDurationMs || must be a positive long number

One or more optional attributes for an ExpandableFab were set, but didn't meet the criteria below: 

 Optional Attribute || Criteria 
 orientation || must be a value of enum class Orientation 
 efabColor || must be an integer color or color state list 
 efabIcon || must be a color or drawable resource 
 efabSize || must be [FabSize.MINI], [FabSize.NORMAL], [FabSize.AUTO] or [FabSize.CUSTOM]. FabSize.CUSTOM should be used when setting the size of the ExpandableFab's layout_width and layout_height to a custom value manually. 
 efabEnabled || must be a boolean 
 iconRotationDeg || must be a floating point number 
 fabOptionSize || must be [FabSize.MINI], [FabSize.NORMAL], [FabSize.AUTO] or [FabSize.CUSTOM]. FabSize.CUSTOM should be used when setting the size of the FabOptions' layout_width and layout_height to a custom value manually. 
 fabOptionPosition || must be a value of enum class FabOptionPosition 
 firstFabOptionMarginPx || must be a floating point number 
 successiveFabOptionMarginPx || must be a floating point number 
 openingAnimationDurationMs || must be a positive long number 
 closingAnimationDurationMs || must be a positive long number 
 closingAnticipateTension || must be a positive float number

One or more optional attributes for a FabOption were set, but didn't meet the criteria below: 

 Optional Attribute || Criteria 
 orientation || must be a value of enum class Orientation 
 fabOptionColor || must be an integer color or color state list 
 fabOptionIcon || must be a color or drawable resource 
 fabOptionEnabled || must be a boolean 
 openingAnimationDurationMs || must be a positive long number 
 closingAnimationDurationMs || must be a positive long number 
 openingOvershootTension || must be a positive long number

One or more optional attributes for a Label were set, but didn't meet the criteria below: 

 labelText || must be a CharSequence 
 labelTextColor || must be an integer color or color state list 
 labelTextSize || must be a positive floating point number 
 labelBackgroundColor || must be an integer color or color state list 
 labelElevation || must be a positive floating point number 
 labelEnabled || must be a boolean 
 position || must be a value of enum class [LabelPosition] 
 marginPx || must be a positive floating point number 
 translationXPx || must be a floating point number 
 visibleToHiddenAnimationDurationMs || must be a positive long number 
 hiddenToVisibleAnimationDurationMs || must be a positive long number 
 overshootTension || must be a positive floating point number
